administration_setgreet: Enables the announcements in this channel or another channel when someone joins the server. If it's already enabled, provide no channel to disable it no matter the channel where it is set.
administration_greetmessage:
Sets the announcement message when someone joins the server.
Placeholders:
`%mention%` - will mention the member
`%member% or %user%` - will write the member's username
`%server%` or `%guild%` - will write the name of the server
`%members%`- will write the server member count.
`%avatar%` - will write the member's avatar url, use it in the embed's thumbnail or image
Embed is supported, generate one here: https://rias.gg/embed.
If the preview is not right, then it means the json code is too long or copied wrong.
administration_setbye: Enables the announcements in the this channel or another when someone leaves the server. If it's already enabled, provide no channel to disable it no matter the channel where it is set.
administration_byemessage:
Sets the announcement message when someone leaves the server.
Placeholders:
`%mention%` - will mention the member
`%member% or %user%` - will write the member's username
`%server%` or `%guild%` - will write the name of the server
`%members%`- will write the server member count.
`%avatar%` - will write the member's avatar url, use it in the embed's thumbnail or image
Embed is supported, generate one here: https://rias.gg/embed.
If the preview is not right, then it means the json code is too long or copied wrong.
administration_setmodlog: Sets this channel or another channel as **mod-log** channel where I will post notifications about warn, mute, unmute, kick, ban, softban, pruneban. If it's already enabled, provide no channel to disable it no matter the channel where it is set.
category_channels_renamecategory: Renames a category channel. Separate the category from the new name with '->'.
category_channels_renamecategory_example:
[{0}renamecategory CATEGORY -> NAME]
{0}renamecategory MEDIA -> MUSIC
{0}renamecategory A B ->; C D
{0}renamecategory 416510975286444032 -> MUSIC
category_channels_addtextchanneltocatego: Adds a text channel to a category channel. Separate the text channel from the category name with '->'.

[{0}atchtocat TEXT_CHANNEL -> CATEGORY]
{0}atchtocat #music -> MEDIA
{0}atchtocat music -> MEDIA
{0}atchtocat 717131629478543500 -> MEDIA
{0}atchtocat music -> 416510975286444032
{0}atchtocat 717131629478543500 -> 416510975286444032
category_channels_addvoicechanneltocateg: Adds a voice channel to a category channel. Separate the voice channel from the category name with '->'.

[{0}avchtocat VOICE_CHANNEL -> CATEGORY]
{0}avchtocat Music -> MEDIA
{0}avchtocat Music -> 416510975286444032
{0}avchtocat 467279437105463315 -> MEDIA
{0}avchtocat 467279437105463315 -> 416510975286444032
emojis_addemoji: Adds an emoji in this server using another emoji or an URL. PNG, JPG or GIF supported. The image's size must be under 256 KB.
emojis_addemoji_examples:
[{0}addemoji EMOJI NAME]
[{0}addemoji URL NAME]
{0}addemoji :diamond_heart: diamondHeart
{0}addemoji https://i.imgur.com/h86xaCX.png diamond_heart
emojis_deleteemoji: Deletes an emoji from this server.
emojis_renameemoji: Renames an emoji on this server. Separate the old emoji by the new name with '->'.
emojis_emoji: Shows the image of an emoji.
moderation_kick: Kicks a member. If you provide a reason message I will DM the member with the reason.
moderation_kick_examples:
[{0}kick MEMBER [REASON]]
{0}kick @Member
{0}kick 327927038360944640
{0}kick @Member Your behavior is bad!
{0}kick 327927038360944640 Your behavior is bad!
moderation_ban:
Bans a member. If you provide a reason message I will DM the member with the reason.
You can also ban a user that is not in the server by using its ID.
moderation_ban_examples:
[{0}ban MEMBER [REASON]]
{0}ban @Member
{0}ban 327927038360944640
{0}ban @Member You've violated many rules!
{0}ban 327927038360944640 You've violated many rules!
moderation_softban: Bans a member with the option to remove his messages from last 7 days, and then unbans it. The result is a kick. If you provide a reason message I will DM the member with the reason.
moderation_softban_examples:
[{0}softban MEMBER [REASON]]
{0}softban @Member
{0}softban 327927038360944640
{0}softban @Member Don't spam here!
{0}softban 327927038360944640 Don't spam here!
moderation_pruneban: Bans a member with the option to remove his messages from last 7 days. Different from "softban" where the member is unbanned. If you provide a reason message I will DM the member with the reason.
moderation_pruneban_examples:
[{0}pruneban MEMBER [REASON]]
{0}pruneban @Member
{0}pruneban 327927038360944640
{0}pruneban @Member DO NOT SPAM HERE!
{0}pruneban 327927038360944640 DO NOT SPAM HERE!
moderation_unban: Unbans a user. You can use user's ID or its username (discriminator accepted) and it will searched through the ban list.
moderation_unban_examples:
[{0}unban USER [REASON]]
{0}unban User
{0}unban 327927038360944640
{0}unban User You are forgiven.
{0}unban 327927038360944640 You are forgiven.
moderation_prune:
[prefix]prune x - removes last x number of messages from the channel (up to 100, including yours).
[prefix]prune @Member - removes all Member's messages in the last 100 messages.
mute_mute: Mutes a member from text and voice channels. You can provide a timeout or mute permanently and you can provide a reason.
mute_mute_examples:
[{0}mute MEMBER [TIMEOUT] [REASON]]
{0}mute @Member
{0}mute @Member Stop talking off topic
{0}mute @Member 1h
{0}mute @Member 1d2h See you tomorrow
mute_unmute: Un-mutes a member from text and voice channels. You can provide a reason.
mute_setmute: Sets the mute role. If the role doesn't exist it will be created.
roles_roles: Shows the roles on this server or a member's roles, paginated.
roles_createrole: Creates a role with the provided name.
roles_rolecolour:
Sets the color for a role. The color can be a hex format or a html name, '#' is optional.
If the role's name has more than one word use quotation marks to properly take the role.
roles_rolecolour_examples:
[{0}rolecolour ROLE COLOUR]
{0}rolecolour Rias #dc143c
{0}rolecolour Rias crimson
{0}rolecolour "Rias Gremory" #dc143c
{0}rolecolour 416771209833742368 ff0000
roles_renamerole: Renames a role. You have to separate the old name by the new name with '->'.
roles_renamerole_examples:
[{0}renamerole ROLE -> NAME]
{0}renamerole Admin -> Staff
{0}renamerole @Admin -> Staff
{0}renamerole 416771209833742368 -> Staff
roles_hoistrole: Sets the role to be or not displayed independently in the member list.
roles_mentionrole: Sets the role to be or not mentioned.
roles_addrole: Adds/Sets a role to a member.
roles_addrole_examples:
[{0}addrole MEMBER ROLE]
{0}addrole Member Admin
{0}addrole @Member Admin
{0}addrole Member 613497353143451649
{0}addrole 327927038360944640 613497353143451649
roles_removerole: Removes a role from a member.
roles_removerole_examples:
[{0}removerole MEMBER ROLE]
{0}removerole Member Admin
{0}removerole @Member Admin
{0}removerole Member 613497353143451649
{0}removerole 327927038360944640 613497353143451649
roles_autoassignablerole: Sets a role to be auto-assigned for every member who joins the server. Provide no role to deactivate it.
self_assignable_roles_iam: Assign to yourself a role from this server's self assignable roles list.
self_assignable_roles_iamnot: Remove from yourself a role from this server's self assignable roles list.
self_assignable_roles_addselfassignabler: Adds a role in this server's self assignable roles list.
self_assignable_roles_removeselfassignab: Removes a role in this server's self assignable roles list.
self_assignable_roles_listselfassignable: Shows this server's self assignable roles list, paginated.
server_setnickname: Sets a member's nickname in this server. Provide no arguments to remove its nickname.
server_setnickname_examples:
[{0}setnickname MEMBER [NICKNAME]]
{0}setnickname Member
{0}setnickname Member nickname
{0}setnickname @Member nickname
{0}setnickname 327927038360944640 nickname
server_setmynickname: I will set your nickname in this server if you have the permission to change your nickname. Provide no arguments for me to remove your nickname.
text_channels_renametextchannel: Renames a text channel. Separate the text channel from the name with '->'.
text_channels_renametextchannel_examples:
[{0}renametextchannel TEXT_CHANNEL -> NAME]
{0}renametextchannel media -> music
{0}renametextchannel #media -> music
{0}renametextchannel 416511169214545920 -> music
text_channels_setchanneltopic: Sets this channel topic. Provide no topic to remove the topic from this channel.
text_channels_setnsfwchannel: Toggles this channel or another channel as NSFW.
voice_channels_renamevoicechannel: Renames a voice channel. Separate the voice channel from the name with '->'.
warnings_warn: Warn a member. Also, you can specify a reason.
warnings_warn_examples:
[{0}warn MEMBER [REASON]]
{0}warn Member
{0}warn @Member
{0}warn 327927038360944640
{0}warn Member Rule violated...
{0}warn 327927038360944640 Rule violated...
warnings_warnings: Shows all warned members in this server, paginated, or shows all warnings for a member.
warnings_clearwarning:
Clear one warning or all warnings of a member.
Administrators can clear any warning and moderators can clear only the warnings they added to a member.
warnings_clearwarning_examples:
[{0}clearwarning MEMBER WARNING_ID]
{0}clearwarning Member 1
{0}clearwarning @Member 2
{0}clearwarning 327927038360944640 1
{0}clearwarning Member all
{0}clearwarning 327927038360944640 all
warnings_editwarning: Edit one warning of a member. Administrators can edit any warning and moderators can edit only the warnings they added to a member.
warnings_editwarning_examples:
[{0}editwarning MEMBER WARNING_ID [REASON]]
{0}editwarning Member 1 I did a typo
{0}editwarning @Member 2 You didn't do it that bad
{0}clearwarning 327927038360944640 1 Maybe I'll forgive you
warnings_warningpunishment: Shows the current warning punishment in this server.
warnings_setwarningpunishment:
Sets the warning punishment (mute, kick, ban, softban or pruneban) and the number of warnings (maximum 10) that trigger it.
Set it to 0 to disable the current warning punishment.
bot_leaveguild: Makes me to leave a guild/server.
bot_reload: Reload the credentials, commands information, the translations/locales or the converter units from their configuration files.
bot_reload_examples:
[{0}reload CONFIGURATION]
{0}reload creds
{0}reload config
{0}reload locales
{0}reload translations
{0}reload commands
{0}reload units
bot_send:
I will send a message to a channel from this server.
Embed is supported, generate one here: https://rias.gg/embed.
bot_send_examples:
[{0}send TEXT_CHANNEL MESSAGE]
{0}send #announcements message
{0}send announcements message
{0}send 651974344037236738 message
bot_bot_send:
I will send a message to a channel from a server `<channel-id>` or to a user `<u:user-id>`.
Embed is supported, generate one here: https://rias.gg/embed.
bot_bot_send_examples:
[{0}send CHANNEL_ID MESSAGE]
[{0}send u:USER_ID MESSAGE]
{0}send 381975649428176907 message
{0}send u:327927038360944640 message
bot_edit:
I will edit a message that I own from a channel.
Embed is supported, generate one here: https://rias.gg/embed.
bot_edit_examples:
[{0}edit TEXT_CHANNEL MESSAGE_ID MESSAGE]
{0}edit #announcements 815546587555823638 message
{0}edit announcements 815546587555823638 message
{0}edit 651974344037236738 815546587555823638 message.
bot_bot_edit:
I will edit a message that I own and is available in a server channel or a DM.
Embed is supported, generate one here: https://rias.gg/embed.
bot_finduser: Searches a user from Discord and shows its info.
activity_activity: Sets my activity to `Playing`, `Listening to`, `Watching` `Competing in` or `Streaming`. Rotation is supported, in seconds.
activity_activity_examples:
[{0}activity TYPE NAME]
[{0}activity TIME ACTIVITIES]
{0}activity playing r!h for help
{0}activity streaming https://www.twitch.tv/ twitch
{0}activity 30 playing r!h for help
watching anime
activity_status: Sets my status to Online, Idle/AFK, DnD/DoNotDisturb, Invisible/Offline.
database_delete: Deletes a user from the database. The [currency], global xp, waifus and profile settings will be erased.
database_database: Shows details about a user from the database.
database_botban: Bans a user from using me. It will also be added to the blacklist.
database_removebotban: Unbans a user, allow it to use me. It will not be removed from the blacklist (if it is).
commands_deletecommandmessage: Toggles the deletion of the member's message that triggered the command.
gambling_wheel: Bet on wheel. You can win up to 2x of the bet.
blackjack_blackjack:
Play a game of blackjack.

**Rules:**
- 4 decks of cards, re-shuffling when below 2 decks
- "Push" gives the player the bet back
- The house draws on soft 17 hand
- If player and the house have 21 (Blackjack) then it's a push
- The Blackjack payout is 3:2
- Splitting is allowed once
- No half pay on surrender
- No insurance
- No double

Some of the non-existent features from above may come in the future.

**Options:**
- hit (🎴) - draw a card from the deck
- stand (🤚) - stand with your cards
- split (↔) - split your hand in two if you have a pair

The blackjack session will be available for 24 hours.
blackjack_blackjack_resume: Resumes the blackjack session in this channel.
blackjack_blackjack_stop: Stops the blackjack session, you will also lose the bet.
currency_currency: Shows the [currency] you have or for a member.
currency_reward: Rewards a user with some amount of [currency].
currency_take: Takes some amount of [currency] from a user.
currency_leaderboard: Shows a list with [currency] of users.
games_8ball_examples:
[{0}8ball QUESTION]
{0}8ball Should I sleep right now?
help_help: Shows a help info for a command, or shows the general help info if no arguments are given.
help_commands: Shows all commands of a module or submodule.
help_allcommands: I will DM you with all commands.
nsfw_hentai: Shows a hentai image. Tags are supported (up to 3), separate them by comma. A tag formed from multiple words contains whitespaces.
nsfw_danbooru: Shows a hentai image from Danbooru. Tags are supported (up to 3), separate them by comma. A tag formed from multiple words contains whitespaces.
nsfw_konachan: Shows a hentai image from Konachan. Tags are supported (up to 3), separate them by comma. A tag formed from multiple words contains whitespaces.
nsfw_yandere: Shows a hentai image from Yandere. Tags are supported (up to 3), separate them by comma. A tag formed from multiple words contains whitespaces.
nsfw_gelbooru: Shows a hentai image from Gelbooru. Tags are supported (up to 3), separate them by comma. A tag formed from multiple words contains whitespaces.
nsfw_hentaiplus: Shows multiple hentai images from Danbooru, Konachan, Yandere and Gelbooru. Tags are supported (up to 3), separate them by comma. A tag formed from multiple words contains whitespaces.
profile_profile: Shows your profile or for a member.
profile_profile_background:
Sets the profile's background image. Price: 1000 [currency].
Only https. Direct image links, png, jpg or jpeg allowed.
For better results, resize and/or crop the image to 500x250.
NSFW images are not allowed, you will be banned.
profile_profile_dim: Sets the profile's background dim. Default is 50%. 0 means the background will have the original brightness, 100 means full black.
profile_profile_biography_examples:
[{0}profile bio TEXT]
{0}profile bio Rias is my waifu.
profile_profile_colour:
Sets the profile's color. The color can be a hex format or a html name, '#' is optional.
Only White, Red, Green, Cyan, Orange, HotPink and Magenta are available. For a custom one you must be a Patron.
profile_profile_badge: Sets a profile badge. There are 3 badges that a user can have depending of its Patreon tier. To remove a badge simply provide no text.
profile_profile_badge_examples:
[{0}profile badge NUMBER [TEXT]]
{0}profile badge 1 2D>3D
{0}profile badge 2 Hentai
{0}profile badge 3 Neko
reactions_goodmorning: Good morning! It's a nice day.
reactions_baka: Point to someone who is an idiot, it can be you too.
reactions_waifuinsult:
Insult someone's waifu. Optionally you can provide both the member and the waifu.
Because of that option, if you want to use a multi-word username you will have to wrap it in quotation marks, use mention or ID.
This command doesn't work on yourself.
reactions_waifuinsult_examples:
[{0}waifuinsult MEMBER [WAIFU]]
{0}waifuinsult Member
{0}waifuinsult Member waifu
{0}waifuinsult "FistName LastName" waifu
{0}waifuinsult @Member
{0}waifuinsult @Member waifu
{0}waifuinsult 327927038360944640
{0}waifuinsult 327927038360944640 waifu
anime_anime: Shows info about an anime from AniList.
anime_manga: Shows info about a manga from AniList.
anime_character:
Shows info about a character from AniList or a custom character from the database (i.e. characters from games that are not on AniList).
You can request a normal character using her name or ID, and you can request a custom character using her name or `wID` (put a `w` before the ID).
anime_updatecharacter: Retrieves the data about a character from Anilist and updates it in the local database.
anime_animelist: Shows a list with anime and their IDs from AniList matching the title, paginated.
anime_mangalist: Shows a list with manga and their IDs from AniList matching the title, paginated.
anime_characters: Shows a list with characters and their IDs from AniList matching the name, paginated. The custom characters are also included.
anime_animecharacters: Shows a list with characters and their IDs from an anime, paginated.
utility_setprefix: Sets the prefix on this server.
utility_setlanguage: Sets my language in this server.
utility_patrons: Shows a list with all users that support this project, ordered by their donation amount, paginated.
utility_vote: Vote me to become more popular.
utility_votes: Shows a list with all users that voted in the last specified time, default is 12 hours, paginated.
utility_choose: I will choose an item from a list. Separators: [,], [|], [;].
utility_color: Generates a preview image of a hex color or a html name color. '#' is optional.
utility_converter:
Convert from a unit to another. You don't have to specify the category, but for explicit cases where some units have the same abbreviations in different categories, you can use it.
The unit names can or not contain spaces; if they do, then use quotes.
The units singular, plural or abbreviation names can be used, then compatible units will be searched to match with the first unit.
The abbreviations are case-insensitive! However, if you want to convert from a unit to another that have the same abbreviation but a letter or two are lowercase or uppercase, then append a `!` in front of the abbreviation.
utility_converter_examples:
[{0}convert [CATEGORY] VALUE UNIT1 UNIT2]
[{0}convert [CATEGORY] UNIT1 UNIT2 VALUE]
{0}convert 2 km mi
{0}convert km mi 2
{0}convert 5 eur usd
{0}convert 3 nm !NM 1
{0}convert 5 "euro" "united states dollar"
{0}convert 5 euro unitedstatesdollar
{0}convert length 1 mi km
{0}convert time h m 1
utility_converterlist:
Shows all the units categories from the converter, paginated.
If a category is provided then it shows all the units from that category, paginated.
info_memberinfo: Shows the info for a member. Provide no arguments to show your info.
info_serverinfo: Shows the info for this server.
info_avatar: Shows the server avatar for a member. Provide no arguments to show your server avatar.
info_useravatar: Shows the global avatar for a member. Provide no arguments to show your global avatar.
info_servericon: Shows the icon of this server.
waifu_waifus: Shows all your waifus or for a member
waifu_waifu_claim:
Claim a waifu, this can be any character from AniList, or a custom character from the database (i.e. the characters that are from games and not on AniList).
You can claim a normal waifu using her name or ID, and you can claim a custom waifu using her name or `wID` (put a `w` before the ID).

The price for every waifu usually starts from 1000 [currency] and grows for each claim with 10 [currency], also it will decrease for each divorce.
waifu_waifu_claim_examples:
[{0}waifu claim NAME/ID]
{0}waifu claim Rias Gremory
{0}waifu claim 50389
{0}waifu claim w1
waifu_waifu_divorce_examples:
[{0}waifu divorce NAME/ID]
{0}waifu divorce Rias Gremory
{0}waifu claim 50389
{0}waifu divorce w1
waifu_waifu_special: Make a waifu special/beloved. Only one waifu can be special, if you set another one, the previous one will have this status removed. The price is 5000 [currency]. This action is not reversible.
waifu_waifu_special_examples:
[{0}waifu special NAME/ID]
{0}waifu special Rias Gremory
{0}waifu special 50389
{0}waifu special w1
waifu_waifu_image:
Set an image for your special waifu or for your custom ones, the url link comes first then the waifu name or id. Oh and it's free.
NSFW images are not allowed, you will be banned.
waifu_waifu_image_examples:
[{0}waifu avatar URL NAME/ID]
{0}waifu avatar https://i.imgur.com/ZW96TT6.jpg Rias Gremory
{0}waifu avatar https://i.imgur.com/ZW96TT6.jpg 50389
{0}waifu avatar https://i.imgur.com/ZW96TT6.jpg w1
waifu_waifu_position: Set the position of a waifu. Think of it as a list, if you move one above all the others below will have the position incremented.
waifu_waifu_position_examples:
[{0}waifu position NUMBER NAME/ID]
{0}waifu position 1 Rias Gremory
{0}waifu position 2 50389
{0}waifu position 3 w1
waifu_waifu_create: Create a waifu. Put a direct link image and a name. The price is 10000 [currency]. She will have the beloved status automatically.
waifu_waifu_create_examples:
[{0}waifu create URL NAME]
{0}waifu create https://i.imgur.com/ZW96TT6.jpg My Waifu
xp_xp: Shows your global level, global xp, server level and server xp, or for a member.
xp_xpnotification: Enables the server xp notifications in this channel or another channel. If it's already enabled, provide no channel to disable it no matter the channel where it is set. By default the notifications will be sent in the channel where the member leveled up.
xp_xpmessage:
Sets the xp notification message. Provide no arguments to clear the set xp notification message and use the default one.
Placeholders:
`%mention%` - will mention the member
`%member% or %user%` - will write the member's username
`%server%` or `%guild%` - will write the name of the server
`%avatar%` - will write the member's avatar url, use it in the embed's thumbnail or image
`%level%` - will write the member's reached level
Embed is supported, generate one here: https://rias.gg/embed.
If the preview is not right, then it means the json code is too long or copied wrong.
xp_xpmessagereward:
Sets the xp notification message for a level up role reward. Provide no arguments to clear the set xp notification message level up role reward and use the default one.
Placeholders:
`%mention%` - will mention the member
`%member% or %user%` - will write the member's username
`%server%` or `%guild%` - will write the name of the server
`%avatar%` - will write the member's avatar url, use it in the embed's thumbnail or image
`%level%` - will write the member's reached level
`%role%` - will write the rewarded role's name
`%role_mention%` - will write the rewarded role's mention
Embed is supported, generate one here: https://rias.gg/embed.
If the preview is not right, then it means the json code is too long or copied wrong.
xp_xpmessagereward_examples:
[{0}xpmessagereward [MESSAGE]]
{0}xpmessagereward
{0}xpmessagereward Congratulations %mention%! You are now level %level% and received role %role%.
{0}xpmessagereward Congratulations %mention%! You reached level %level%. You are now %role%.
xp_leveluprolereward:
Adds a role in the level up role reward list.
When a member reaches the level it will be rewarded with the role.
To remove a role from the list provide no role for the respective level.
xp_leveluprolerewardlist: Shows the with level up role reward list.
xp_xpignore:
Add or remove a channel from the xp exclusion list. The members who write in the excluded channels will not receive any xp. Provide no channel to add or remove this channel.
You can also add a category and all the text channels from that category will be added or removed from the list. If no channel from a category is present in the list then all channels from that category will be added, otherwise the excluded channels will be removed.
xp_xpignorelist: Shows all the channels in the xp exclusion list, paginated.
xp_setxpignorerole: Sets a role for the xp ignore. The members with this role will not receive server xp.
xp_xpignorerole: Shows the current xp ignored role.
xp_removexpignorerole: Removes the currently set role for the xp ignore.
